lines.text: What's the matter pisseyes? You need a fresh jumpstart?
For$50 Million Dollars, only one person thinks you're worth it! And he runs on batteries!
This psycho's an android?

[Throwing someone out of a high rise window]
It's going to start raining hostages

[Head bursting through an airvent floor right in front of Sarah and Desilva]
Going Somewhere?
You asshole! What do you think this is, the first and ten at the Super Bowl?
Hey, maybe you need a manual to tell you when you're getting your ass kicked... but I don't.
An android? You gotta be kidding. This psycho is an android?
Android yes. Psycho no.
What are you doing?
Catching up on some sleep. I've only had a couple of years.
You think if we pull this off there'll be a nice big bonus for us?
I think if we pull this off we'll be lucky to keep what's left of our nuts.
You're crazy.
Certifiable.
You don't know when you're finished, do you Desilva?
Sorry. But I gotta settle something with this freak of yours.
Come on asshole you can do better than that!
My grandmother can shoot better than that... and she's dead!

[on walky talky]
Trevanian, I'm sending the girl down now."

[fist pump]
YEEEEEEEEAH!
Hey!
[Zanuchi turns around and Desilva kicks him in the face]
Two points!
